Package it.polimi.GC13.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.GC13.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Player class represents a player in a game

    • setPrivateObjectiveCard

      public void setPrivateObjectiveCard(int serialPrivateObjectiveCard, int readyPlayers) throws GenericException
      Chooses a private objective card for the game.
      Parameters:
      serialPrivateObjectiveCard - the serial number of the chosen private objective card.
      readyPlayers - the number of players ready.
      Throws:
      GenericException - if the private objective card is not in the player's hand or already chosen.
